title: Harlow experiments infant and mother monkeys show

content.question: The results of experiments with infant monkeys who were placed in enclosures with mother monkeys made of cloth with no food or wire with food show which of the following?

choices.label: Contact comfort was the primary basis of attachment for the infant monkeys.
Female infant monkeys are more obedient than male infant monkeys.
Food outranked all other factors in the development of the infant monkeysâ€™ attachment to the mother.
Infant monkeys mimic the surrogate mothers' behavior.

content.answer: Contact comfort was the primary basis of attachment for the infant monkeys.
